response.overview: Sofia, 18-year-old Korean-American woman, gets involved in a fatal hit-and-run accident. While the accident is kept secret from the people around her, Sofia struggles from trauma and guilt, unable to properly confront her partner, Eleazer, who argues that they should keep the accident a secret. One day, Eleazer visits Sofia at her workplace to make sure that she has been keeping her mouth shut. An abrupt turn of events push the couple to their limits, revealing the secrets around the traumatic accident and their relationship. Sofia has to choose between her boyfriend and her moral conscience.
response.title: The Color of Fire
